StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: UPDATETUTORTECHINICIAN
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE GRUPO10.UPDATETUTORTECHINICIAN(pIDPerson IN NUMBER, pFirstName IN VARCHAR2, pSurname IN VARCHAR2,&lt;br/&gt;pTitle IN VARCHAR2, pAddress IN VARCHAR2, pPhone IN NUMBER, pPostcode IN NUMBER,&lt;br/&gt;pCampusLocation IN VARCHAR2, pIdBuilding IN VARCHAR2, pNumberOffice IN VARCHAR2, pStaffType IN VARCHAR2, &lt;br/&gt;pTechTitle IN VARCHAR2, pTechSkill IN VARCHAR2) AS&lt;br/&gt;BEGIN &lt;br/&gt; UPDATE Technician_table tech&lt;br/&gt; SET tech.surname = pSurname,&lt;br/&gt; tech.firstName = pFirstName,&lt;br/&gt; tech.title = pTitle,&lt;br/&gt; tech.address = pAddress,&lt;br/&gt; tech.phone = pPhone,&lt;br/&gt; tech.postcode = pPostcode,&lt;br/&gt; tech.campusLocation = pCampusLocation,&lt;br/&gt;&lt;br/&gt; tech.idBuilding = pIdBuilding,&lt;br/&gt; tech.numberOffice = pNumberOffice,&lt;br/&gt; tech.staffType = pStaffType,&lt;br/&gt; tech.techTitle = pTechTitle,&lt;br/&gt; tech.techSkill = pTechSkill&lt;br/&gt; WHERE tech.idPerson = pIDPerson;&lt;br/&gt;END updateTutorTechinician;
